short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A free privacy tool courtesy of Onerep

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YourControl is a free, open-source extension that simplifies opting out from major non-public data brokers, including those that supply information to people-search sites, helping reduce your data's exposure online.

The tool lets you manage the process yourself, without relying on third-party services, ensuring your sensitive information stays on your device and is only shared directly with data brokers when absolutely necessary.

Our team has distilled extensive knowledge of data brokers into simple, accessible guides. With a split-screen view, you can follow clear instructions on one side while completing opt-out forms on the other—no tab switching required.

Take control of your data today—conveniently and securely.

Source Code: https://github.com/onerep-privacy/yourcontrol
